name: Permute
description: Rotate and navigate a colorful world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 128 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Pentium 4 (Prescott) or later Memory: 256 MB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
